name: DeskSMS Metro Dark
description:
A re-themed metro like version of Koush's DeskSMS because the white makes my Eyes Bleed. Very Minimalistic with re padded boxes and header.

Screenshots

- http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee370/wavedashdoc/DeskSMSMetroDark.png <-Full view
- http://userstyles.org/style_screenshots/52318_additional_834.png <-Text Entry Box
additional_info:
Now Featured as an optional theme for clockworkmod/desk/sms/#!
kudos to Koush! 


Version 1.2.1
    *Fixed Phone icon being too small
-----------------------------

Version 1.2
    *New icons for the old text for; (call, text, delete)

-----------------------------

Version 1.1
    *Fixed Background issues
    *Fixed style interfering with youtube and other websites.
    *Screenshots added since userstyles in page screenshots not working.

-----------------------------

Version 1
    *Initial release

-Coming soon txt box color chooser. (instead of just cyan)

*Please comment and rate.
